Iraq: On Friday, April 17, the Minister of Health and Environment,  announced the instigation of a partial curfew from Thursday, April 23, to coincide with the start of the month of Ramadan. . From Thursday, April 23, existing measures, such as the closure of educational institutions and border closures, will remain in place.

description: Iraq: Authorities announced that a total lockdown will be imposed in Erbil from Tuesday, June 30, due to an increase in locally-detected cases of the coronavirus disease (COVID-19).
